title: NA to OCE transfer - is it still free?
body:
Hi
so 2 years ago, league announced that NA to OCE is free of transfer, you just need 1 RP

is it still available now?
and if so, I want to transfer my RU account to OCE but RU cant transfer to OCE, so I need to do RU > NA > OCE
is NA to OCE still free? 

thnks!

replies.body:
No it isn't, it was only free for a month or two after the release of the server to allow OCE players who had invested on their NA accounts to move to their new home server.

I would recommend ticketing support about this one, they may be able to help you transfer without paying for it twice.
